description.value: The army uses unconventional tactics. You can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.Dirty Fighting], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.False Retreat], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.Feint] tactical war actions, and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.Counterattack] tactical reaction with the army.
